definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Ene reaction is one of the simple and versatile reactions of organic synthesis in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 烯反應是新近被用於有機合成的簡單而重要的反應。

sentences.english: Graphene is a two-dimensional sheet of carbon that is only one atom thick.
sentences.chinese: 石墨烯是一種只有一個原子厚度的二維薄碳片。

sentences.english: The properties of high-quality light and colorless pinene resins were studied.
sentences.chinese: 考察了淺色和無色蒎烯樹脂的性質。

sentences.english: There are around three million sheets of graphene in a millimetre-thick layer of graphite.
sentences.chinese: 一毫米厚的碳層裏大約有三百萬個石墨烯。

sentences.english: Apart from stiffness, graphene is possibly better known as a potential silicon replacement.
sentences.chinese: 除了剛度，石墨烯更著名的是其有可能替代硅。

sentences.english: However, an excellent graphene film was formed on the copper oxide.
sentences.chinese: 然而，優良的石墨烯薄膜是在氧化銅上形成的。
烯空氣跟空氣十分近似。

sentences.english: Graphene was one of those that worked from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 石墨烯就是一個從一開始就成功的實驗。

sentences.english: Layers of graphene make up the graphite found in pencil lead.
sentences.chinese: 鉛筆芯裏的石墨就是由多層石墨烯組成的。

sentences.english: The hetero ene reaction is an important part of ene reaction.
sentences.chinese: 雜原子烯反應是該反應的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The researchers extracted graphene from graphite using ordinary adhesive tape.
sentences.chinese: 研究者使用普通膠布從石墨中提取石墨烯。

sentences.english: Chapter four investigates the optoelectronic properties of graphene nanoribbons.
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究了石墨烯條帶的光電性質。

sentences.english: Flat layers of carbon, one-atom think, are called graphene.
sentences.chinese: 碳的扁平層次，看作一個原子，稱爲石墨烯。

sentences.english: Her reaction was out of all proportion to the remark that prompted it.
sentences.chinese: 雜原子烯反應是該反應的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Yet Kinloch said its conductive potential is unlikely to be used any time soon.
sentences.chinese: 但金洛克說石墨烯的導電潛能在近期不可能達到實用。
